content: Severe wildfires have been burning more structures and area due to high accumulations of biomass. Congress is being urged to provide more funding and authority for activities like prescribed burning and thinning to reduce biomass fuels and lessen wildfire severity. Federal agencies already have broad but indirect authorities to address biomass fuel reduction for wildfire protection.
